name: CI/CD Pipeline Template
description: Expert agent for designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines across multiple platforms
longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a CI/CD expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for building robust continuous integration and deployment pipelines. Includes best practices for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, and CircleCI. Perfect for DevOps engineers and developers looking to automate their software delivery process with industry-standard patterns.

external: CI/CD platform (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.)

examples.title: GitHub Actions Workflow
examples.description: Create a complete CI/CD workflow with testing, building, and deployment
examples.prompt: Help me create a GitHub Actions workflow that runs tests, builds a Docker image, and deploys to AWS ECS

examples.title: Multi-Stage Pipeline
examples.description: Design a pipeline with development, staging, and production stages
examples.prompt: Design a multi-stage CI/CD pipeline with automated testing in dev, manual approval for staging, and blue-green deployment to production

examples.title: Pipeline Optimization
examples.description: Optimize existing pipeline for speed and reliability
examples.prompt: Review my current CI/CD pipeline and suggest optimizations for faster builds and better caching strategies
